Token.Abstract: A delegate can implement this protocol to be notified when the OGWKinematicsAspect has updated velocity and position.
This selector is performed twice, once for each axis. The X axis is integrated first. Delegates can implement this selector to perform additional contact resolution.

Parameter.Name: position
Parameter.Abstract: The updated position after the current OGWAxis has been integrated. This position may be different from entity.position, and is only applied to entity.position after both axis have been integrated.

Parameter.Name: velocity
Parameter.Abstract: The current velocity the kinematics aspect is applying to position.

Parameter.Name: axis
Parameter.Abstract: The axis the kinematics aspect did integrate. The X axis is integrated before the Y axis. When this parameter is OGWAxisX then the position->y has not been integrated yet.
